_header: From God was sent an angel bright
_description: ‘fferia iiiia in quatuor temporum’, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: Fra god was sent ane angel brightGabriel for soth he hight…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …And emperise of hell haly and hendeBlisced scho be with owten ende
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin “MIssus est angelus gabriel a deo & cetera.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: Feriorum iiii in quatuor temporum secundum Lucam (rubric, f. 6rb)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Heuser,  Wilhelm. 
             “With an O and an I.” 
             Anglia
         27 (1904): 283-319: 290-3.
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): I.178-185.
